title: Welcome to the Deep 7 Research Track Portal
text:
What is the Research Track?
The research track is a formal process that allows NOAA scientists the opportunity to deep dive into our scientific approaches and improve how we assess and manage our fisheries. The benefits of a research track are that we are not limited by strict management deadlines.


Meet the team behind the work
The members of the Island Fisheries Stock Assessment Program at the Pacific Island Fisheries Science Center are working on the modules for the research track.




Megumi Oshima is a stock assessment scientist. She worked on the 2024 Deep 7 Stock Assessment and is working on a simulation model to test the impact of survey effort on estimating the Opakapaka population.
